Leland follows the story of Leland P. Fitzgerald (Ryan Gosling), a disaffected teenager who has apparently murdered a severely retarded peer, the brother of popular high school student Allison Hargrove (Hilary Swank). After the murder, he moves in with his Aunt Linda Reisman (played by Christina Ricci). However, Lelands depression turns into schizophrenia and he believes that people are talking about him. The story is narrated by Derek Hessing

Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: “Early Years” depicts his adolescence up until his giving up the world (1889 – 1905); the second part, “Exit From Darkness”, starts where the first one ends and follows him on through to his death (1932).
